0.1.0.name: connect20/Ifuturz_Productvideo
0.1.0.description: This extension adds the facility to manage your videos associated with Magento products in the same way you manage the images from the Magento admin panel.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
